# PARAMS.TXT
# Dynamics Pipeline parameters file generated by NMBLTS
# for use with the stand-alone version of a dynamic simulation.
# Created 08/07/2006 03:55:01 PM
# Name of original SIMM model: Dynamic Mocap Model
#
# This file contains all of the parameters that you can specify at
# run-time in a dynamic simulation (stand-alone version). To change
# one of them, remove the '#' from the beginning of the line (which
# identifies the line as a comment), and change the parameter to the
# desired value.

####################### Force Matte Definitions #######################
# force mattes can be used to apply forces defined in the ground
# reference frame to some other body segment.
# force_matte matte_name bone_file_name segment_name

##################### Muscle State Initialization #####################
# You can specify the initial values of the muscle model states for each
# muscle by un-commenting the appropriate line[s] below and replacing
# the zeros with the initial values. You must specify the state values
# in the order that the states are numbered in the muscle derivative
# function for that muscle model (in derivs.c). You can specify fewer
# than the total number of states in the muscle model, but the N values
# that you specify will be used to initialize the *first* N states in the
# model. If you specify more states than there are in the muscle model,
# the extra values will be ignored.
# muscle_name state1_init_value state2_init_value ...
#
#glut_max1_r 0.0 0.0 0.0
